23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Talib bin Hujair: From Hud bin 'Abdullah bin Sa'd, from his grandfather Mazidah, who said: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) on the Day of the Conquest and there was gold and silver on his sword." Talib said: "So I asked him about the silver and he said: 'The hand-guard of his sword was of silver.'" [Abu 'Eisa said:] There is something on this topic form Anas. This Hadith is Hasan Gharib. Hud's (great) grandfather's name is Mazidah Al-'Asari

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السُّيُوفِ وَحِلْيَتِهَا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Swords And Their Ornamentation
